languages.text: "Вынужден отказаться от вашего щедрого предложения, магос. Я предпочитаю служить Золотому Трону с полным комплектом конечностей".
"I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."
languages.original_text: "Вынужден отказаться от вашего щедрого предложения, магос. Я предпочитаю служить Золотому Трону с полным комплектом конечностей".

traits.locale_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「マゴス、その寛大な申し出は遠慮させてもらう。私はむしろ、この完全な四肢をもって、黄金の玉座に仕え続けたいのだ」
languages.original_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."

traits.locale_text: 「マゴス、その寛大な申し出は遠慮させてもらう。私はむしろ、この完全な四肢をもって、黄金の玉座に仕え続けたいのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我不得不拒绝你慷慨的提议，贤者。我更希望以完整的身躯侍奉黄金王座。”
languages.original_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."

traits.locale_text: “我不得不拒绝你慷慨的提议，贤者。我更希望以完整的身躯侍奉黄金王座。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Merci pour cette offre si généreuse, magos, mais je me dois de décliner. Je préfère garder tous mes membres pour servir le Trône d'Or. »
languages.original_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour cette offre si généreuse, magos, mais je me dois de décliner. Je préfère garder tous mes membres pour servir le Trône d'Or. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss Euer großzügiges Angebot ablehnen, Magos. Ich diene dem Goldenen Thron lieber weiterhin mit all meinen Gliedmaßen."
languages.original_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss Euer großzügiges Angebot ablehnen, Magos. Ich diene dem Goldenen Thron lieber weiterhin mit all meinen Gliedmaßen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Me temo que tengo que rechazar su generosa oferta, magos. Prefiero seguir sirviendo al Trono Dorado con todas mis extremidades».
languages.original_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que tengo que rechazar su generosa oferta, magos. Prefiero seguir sirviendo al Trono Dorado con todas mis extremidades».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."

languages.text: "Cömert teklifini reddetmek zorundayım Magos. Altın Taht'a tüm uzuvlarımla hizmet etmeyi yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "I will have to decline your generous offer, Magos. I would rather keep serving the Golden Throne with my full complement of limbs."

traits.locale_text: "Cömert teklifini reddetmek zorundayım Magos. Altın Taht'a tüm uzuvlarımla hizmet etmeyi yeğlerim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
